about_the_game:
Warning! This game contains depictions of female nudity, citywide destruction, and sexual acts. Reader discretion is advised

OPEN WIDE AND SAY “AHHH!”

The long awaited second book in the U.C.H.E.W.S line of stories finally arrives! Adipose Rex’s newest story let’s the reader be LARGE and in CHARGE!


In a world where women are capable of devouring other members of the public, parts of the country have decided to keep the urge to vore at bay by making it legal for one day a year. Will you choose to play as an up-and-coming female fatty hoping to make it BIG? Or will you take your chances trying to survive as a man on the run?

They choice is yours and yours alone, and one wrong decision might make you dinner, in this text-adventure that’s stuffed with over 20 terrifyingly tasty endings!

Word Count: Nearly 60,000 words

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scene of cannibalism, and numerous descriptions of gigantic naked females. Also contains depictions of sexual acts and female nudity, violent non-consensual cannibalism, violent scenes of crowd panic and city destruction and buildings collapse. Scenes where player character is also stalked as prey by enemy characters in realistic world settings, that may end in non-graphic cruelty or death may also appear. Blood and actual gore deceptions are at a minimum. Cults and demon worship are depicted in one pathway. Player character may end up taking an experimental digestive pill/drug in one pathway if the choose to.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or Higher

short_description: An erotic visual novel with multiple endings! In a alternate America where women have gained the ability to swallow humans whole, some cities have made it legal one day a year! Read or listen as each chapter of the story is played out, with you holding the power of where the story goes next!
